  • Method Details

    • followUser

      void followUser(int userId, int userIdToFollow)
      Add the user with id userId to the followers of the user with id userIdToFollow
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user that wants to follow
      userIdToFollow - the id of the user that will be followed by the user

    • unFollowUser

      void unFollowUser(int userId, int userIdToUnFollow)
      Remove the user with id userIdToUnFollow from the followers of the user with id userId
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user that wants to unfollow
      userIdToUnFollow - the id of the user that will be unfollowed by the user

    • getFollowersCount

      com.example.be_java_hisp_w21_g02.dto.response.FollowersCountDTO getFollowersCount(int userId)
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user that wants to know the number of followers
      Returns:
      A DTO with the number of followers of the user with id userId, it's name and id

    • getFollowersList

      com.example.be_java_hisp_w21_g02.dto.response.FollowersListDTO getFollowersList(int userId)
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user that wants to know the number of followers
      Returns:
      A DTO with the username, id and a list of followers which contains the name and id of each follower

    • getFollowersList

      com.example.be_java_hisp_w21_g02.dto.response.FollowersListDTO getFollowersList(int userId, String order)
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user that wants to know its list of followers
      order - parameter to order the list by name in ascending or descending order
      Returns:
      A DTO with the username, id and a ordered by name list of followers which contains the name and id of each follower

    • getFollowedList

      com.example.be_java_hisp_w21_g02.dto.response.FollowedListDTO getFollowedList(int userId)
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user that wants to know its list of followed users
      Returns:
      A DTO with the username, id and a list of followed users which contains the name and id of each followed user

    • getFollowedList

      com.example.be_java_hisp_w21_g02.dto.response.FollowedListDTO getFollowedList(int userId, String order)
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user that wants to know its list of followed users
      order - parameter to order the list by name in ascending or descending order
      Returns:
      A DTO with the username, id and a ordered by name list of followed users which contains the name and id of each followed user
